attributes.action: Give a knighthood to Kenny Dalglish
attributes.additional_details:
He deserves a knighthood for his football achievements alone
most caps & goals for Scotland

as a player 4 league titles with celtic, 6 league titles with Liverpool plus 3 European cups
first player to score over 100 league goals in both the English and Scottish top divisions.
As a manager, 4 league titles 2 fa cups
perhaps his greatest achievement was after Hillsborough with his wife Marina led the players, the club supporting the families, attending the funerals being a rock for the whole city
attributes.background: Kenny Dalglish is a true football legend, at Celtic FC, Scotland national team and of course Liverpool FC. In addition he will always be remembered how after Hilsborough, he led the grieving and recovery process for the families of the deceased, the fans of Liverpool and the City of Liverpool

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
